title: New Year, New Decade, & Bold Predictions: CES Part 1
description:
In the spirit of CES and the new year, we hunker down in a hotel room to share our predictions for the near future in the tech world, talk about our first day at CES 2020, and wrap it up with a discussion about what we're looking forward to seeing at the remainder of the Consumer Electronics Show.

Links:
https://twitter.com/wvfrm 
https://twitter.com/mkbhd 
https://twitter.com/andymanganelli 
OnePlus Concept Phone: https://bit.ly/35yNMnQ
